channel.title: Mac Problem... as usual
channel.description:
So I have two computers, windows & mac. My friend shared his cache with me & this is nice but it won't run when I put it in my user.home. It just says "error loading..contact staff!". But I know that this is where the cache is supposed to go.
But when I put the same exact folder (no name changes, nothing) in my C:/ on the Windows comp the server runs flawlessly. How can I get it to work on both computers?
Sorry if it's already been asked, but I spent a while looking for a solution & couldn't find one.
Thanks though.

item.title: Mac Problem... as usual
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:539019”]signlink.java, change your findcachedir() to:

public static String findcachedir() { boolean exists = (new File(System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.CACHENAMEHERE/")).exists(); if (exists) { return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.CACHENAMEHERE/"; } else { File f = new File(System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.CACHENAMEHERE/"); f.mkdir(); return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.CACHENAMEHERE/"; } }
make sure to rename the cachenamehere part.
And that means for windows, you have to put the cache in C:\Users\YourComputerUsername\CacheHere[/quote]

Thanks Sk8r that helps me to lol he put allot more detail into it then I did

Read full topic

item.title: Mac Problem... as usual
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

signlink.java, change your findcachedir() to:

public static String findcachedir() { boolean exists = (new File(System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.CACHENAMEHERE/")).exists(); if (exists) { return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.CACHENAMEHERE/"; } else { File f = new File(System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.CACHENAMEHERE/"); f.mkdir(); return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.CACHENAMEHERE/"; } }
make sure to rename the cachenamehere part.
And that means for windows, you have to put the cache in C:\Users\YourComputerUsername\CacheHere\
